title: My Current Workflow With AI
contentHtml: If you haven't explored how AI can support your workflow, you might be working harder than you need to. Just saying...

title: Growth Mindset vs. Fixed Mindset
contentHtml: A growth mindset means trusting that we can improve through effort, feedback, and time.

title: The Newest Graduate in the Building
contentHtml: So...this weekend I did a thing. I achieved a goal I've been chasing for over a decade: I became a college graduate!
